snippet: Michigan State’s athletic department has announced a 15-year multimedia rights partnership with Fox Sports that will provide guaranteed revenue of more than $150 million.
abstract: Michigan State’s athletic department announces 15-year multimedia deal with Fox Sports worth over $150 million.
lead_paragraph: Michigan State’s athletic department has announced a 15-year multimedia rights partnership with Fox Sports that will provide guaranteed revenue of more than $150 million.

headline.main: Fox Sports Deal for Michigan State
